heading: HR01977
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE ILLEGAL DETENTION BY THE BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION OF ZIMBABWE NATIONAL CHANDIWANA TAWANDA, THE ILLEGAL RETENTION OF THE PASSPORTS OF AMERICAN NATIONAL ADAM THOMAS SHAW AND MALAWI NATIONAL MIRACLE OSWAN, AND THE DEPRIVATION OF LIBERTY AND RIGHT TO RETURN OF THESE FOREIGN ACTIVISTS, AND CALLING FOR AN URGENT INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE SAME
principal-authors: TINIO, ANTONIO L.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE ILLEGAL DETENTION BY THE BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION OF ZIMBABWE NATIONAL CHANDIWANA TAWANDA, THE ILLEGAL RETENTION OF THE PASSPORTS OF AMERICAN NATIONAL ADAM THOMAS SHAW AND MALAWI NATIONAL MIRACLE OSWAN, AND THE DEPRIVATION OF LIBERTY AND RIGHT TO RETURN OF THESE FOREIGN ACTIVISTS, AND CALLING FOR AN URGENT INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE SAME
